text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump So your saying You’re OK with your dad holding a rally of thousands of people where the coronavirus can spread through all of them and then when they go home or interact with their friends spread to all of them you’re OK with that let me just make sure I’m clear on this. IDIOT!!
